item.description:
Here we go yet again....you're invited to join us for another happy hour at Coogan's in the Faneuil Hall area to imbibe your favorite social lubricant.

I will arrive at 5 and hang until about 8.

I'll have free Baileys, Kahlua, & Malibu treats for you.

Trivia contest begins at 7. Let's do better, so come out to share the useless information in your head.

Coogan's Web Page

Unfortunately there will NOT be any free food this evening, so if you come hungry here's Coogan's Menu. I was very pleased with the burger and pizza.


PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.how_to_find_us: I will be seated at the end of the bar on the same side as the entrance and should be the only one wearing a Happy New Year tiara.
item.why: Meet people who enjoy the pleasures of a good drink in a fun place
item.name: 4th Time Around
